author: felicity
msg: bug 2195: the bayes time delta expiry estimation calculation (tm)
was inversed.  when we wanted to estimate larger, it would go smaller,
and visa versa.  doh.  I reciprocated the situation.

author: felicity
msg: If we upgraded and spamd was already running, the condrestart would fail
because it was looking for the wrong filename.
